branchCategory.name: C85-XB6, ISO 6432 Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, High Temperature
branchCategory.description: <p> The C85-XB6 series high temperature, single rod, double acting, conforms to ISO 6432 and CETOP RP52P. The C85 is available in bore sizes 8mm through 25mm.</p>
